catalog_info.title: Health Psychology
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: The Psychology Department requires completion of Science of Living Systems 20 (or equivalent) and at least one foundational course from PSY 14, PSY 15, PSY 18 or Science of Living Systems 15 before enrolling in this course.
catalog_info.description: This course will examine psychological and physical health from the perspective of Positive Psychology. A major focus will be on mindfulness theory and its relationship to stress/coping; illness/wellness; decision-making; placebos. The medical model, the bio social model, and a unified mind/body model will be compared to examine their relationship to achieving resilience.
